Desc.eng: Thank you, good sir! I thought I was going to die in this prison. Speaking of prisonsâ€¦ Can you spare some money for a man trying to fit back into society?
Can't help, sorry. We are still saving up for a pony.
Don't listen to her. Of course I can help you. Here's 100 gold.
Why can't you just enjoy your freedom? Leave now and begin a new life.

You are too kind, good sir. So I'm going to let you in on a little secret. There is a secret door in the next cell that leads to the secret holding facilities. They keep a lot of prisoners there, but the place is heavily guarded.
